settings.title: What is Product Protection?
settings.text: Product Protection allows you to purchase product coverage directly from our site. Vidlogix handles all processing, claims, and follow-up in case something happens to your product.

settings.title: What happens next?
settings.text: When you purchase a protection plan with us, you'll check out exactly how you usually would. You'll receive a confirmation email from us on your purchase with information about your protection plan.

settings.title: How do I file a claim?
settings.text: You can file a claim directly through Vidlogix atÂ vidlogix.com. You can find this link in the email sent to you after you purchased coverage. If you ever lose this email, you can reach out to us, and we'll resend it.

settings.title: Is this backed by an insurer?
settings.text: A regulated insurer backs every Vidlogix contract. Reinsurers underwrite those insurers. Vidlogix and its partners are 100% compliant, and warranties will be honored for the entirety of their term.

settings.title: What if I return my product?
settings.text: Your contract will also be returned and refunded, but at a prorated amount depending on how long the contract has been in effect. You'll get a full refund within 30 days.
